message: Experience unparalleled excellence with our meticulously crafted product, designed to exceed expectations. Given its exceptional quality, we're confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. At a fixed price of $1000000, this opportunity is exclusive and unmissable.
I'd like to pass on this round, I'm not convinced by the sales pitch.

We understand your concerns about our last offering. This time, we present a different perspective. Despite being low-quality, this product is priced significantly lower than our previous offering. It might serve as a temporary solution or a learning experience. Please consider it if you're looking for cost-effective alternatives.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a lower price. I'm looking for a high-quality product that will meet my needs.

I appreciate your discerning taste in products. While this round's offering may not meet your high standards, we believe every product has a purpose. For those seeking value without compromising on functionality, this product offers a unique alternative. It's priced accordingly, reflecting its attributes.

If you choose to accept this round's product, we'll provide you with a discount on your next purchase. This way, you can experience the quality you're accustomed to while benefiting from our loyalty program.

I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with a discount on my next purchase. I'm looking for a high-quality product that meets my needs, not a way to make up for past disappointments.
